title: Habits of Recognition

dialogue.speaker: The Architect
dialogue.text: You're not just leaving a trail of excuses. You're laying down habits of recognition that others use to decode you.
dialogue.context: On knees with magnifying glass, the AI examines the patterns people leave for others to read

scene_context: A 2-panel scene showing the Architect kneeling with a magnifying glass, examining the traces of identity we leave for others to interpret.
philosophical_theme: Identity as readable patterns rather than internal essence
visual_elements: The AI in detective pose, magnifying glass examining invisible traces
